Text:
Nice one mate...Please keep the torrent going each week!  It's hard for us ex-pats to see our teams otherwise.

Great torrent.
Yeah....please keep uploading it.I'll try to help seeding the upcoming files for at least three days each week as they are released.

Thanks for this footy....what a great way to watch our lower divisions in action and keep up to date. i am living in Thailand and never get a chance to see my home town play Shrewsbury Town. keep it up mate.
Can anyone point me in the direction of last weekend's show, 25th August? Seems like footy hasn't uploaded it... Many thanks
